President Trump is addicted to chaos at the expense of the American people, so it’s sometimes easy to lose track of the latest crisis. But, we can’t let Trump negotiate illegal agreements that would put the lives of fleeing Central American children & families in jeopardy. (6/6)

In human terms, denying Central American children and families a safe way to claim asylum puts them at further risk so that Trump can push his radical anti-immigrant agenda. (4/6)

The @StateDept Human Rights Reports on #Guatemala and #Mexico make clear they don’t meet U.S. legal standards to sign safe third country agreements because they lack judicial systems with fair procedures to handle asylum claims. (3/6)

But here’s the thing: these agreements with unsafe countries aren’t just dangerous. They’re also illegal.
